column.title: 销售团体,Mega,销售数量(退货后)
销售团体,Mega,商店进货额(退货后GSV)
销售团体,Mega,MARS销售净额（退货后）
销售团体,Middle,销售数量(退货后)
销售团体,Middle,商店进货额(退货后GSV)
销售团体,Middle,MARS销售净额（退货后）
销售团体,IC,销售数量(退货后)
销售团体,IC,商店进货额(退货后GSV)
销售团体,IC,MARS销售净额（退货后）
销售团体,Unknown,销售数量(退货后)
销售团体,Unknown,商店进货额(退货后GSV)
销售团体,Unknown,MARS销售净额（退货后）

content.sql:
SELECT dbo.fn_getMarsWeekDay(convert(VARCHAR(20),dds.bill_date,120)) ,mdis.DIST_NAME
,mp.PROD_CODE AS targetProdCode ,bdi.ITEM_NAME ,mp.prod_name ,dds.PROD_CODE AS distPorodCode
,sum(CASE WHEN dds.PROD_QUANTITY>=0 and orgbdi.dict_item_id=1364 THEN isnull(dbo.fn_getUnitConvByName(item1.item_name,'箱',mp.PROD_CODE,dds.PROD_QUANTITY),0) ELSE 0 END)-abs(sum(CASE WHEN dds.PROD_QUANTITY<0 and orgbdi.dict_item_id=1364 THEN isnull(dbo.fn_getUnitConvByName(item1.item_name,'箱',mp.PROD_CODE,dds.PROD_QUANTITY),0) ELSE 0 END)) AS '销售数量（退货后）' ,sum(CASE WHEN dds.PROD_QUANTITY>=0 and orgbdi.dict_item_id=1364 THEN isnull(dds.PROD_AMOUNT,0) ELSE 0 END)+sum(CASE WHEN dds.PROD_QUANTITY<0 and orgbdi.dict_item_id=1364 THEN isnull(dds.PROD_AMOUNT,0) ELSE 0 END) ,sum(CASE WHEN dds.PROD_QUANTITY>=0 and orgbdi.dict_item_id=1364 THEN isnull(dbo.fn_getUnitConvByName(item1.item_name,'箱',mp.PROD_CODE,dds.PROD_QUANTITY)*mp.prod_price,0) ELSE 0 END)+sum(CASE WHEN dds.PROD_QUANTITY<0 and orgbdi.dict_item_id=1364 THEN isnull(mp.prod_price*dbo.fn_getUnitConvByName(item1.item_name,'箱',mp.PROD_CODE,dds.PROD_QUANTITY),0) ELSE 0 END)
,sum(CASE WHEN dds.PROD_QUANTITY>=0 and orgbdi.dict_item_id=1365 THEN isnull(dbo.fn_getUnitConvByName(item1.item_name,'箱',mp.PROD_CODE,dds.PROD_QUANTITY),0) ELSE 0 END)-abs(sum(CASE WHEN dds.PROD_QUANTITY<0 and orgbdi.dict_item_id=1365 THEN isnull(dbo.fn_getUnitConvByName(item1.item_name,'箱',mp.PROD_CODE,dds.PROD_QUANTITY),0) ELSE 0 END)) AS '销售数量（退货后）' ,sum(CASE WHEN dds.PROD_QUANTITY>=0 and orgbdi.dict_item_id=1365 THEN isnull(dds.PROD_AMOUNT,0) ELSE 0 END)+sum(CASE WHEN dds.PROD_QUANTITY<0 and orgbdi.dict_item_id=1365 THEN isnull(dds.PROD_AMOUNT,0) ELSE 0 END) ,sum(CASE WHEN dds.PROD_QUANTITY>=0 and orgbdi.dict_item_id=1365 THEN isnull(mp.prod_price*dbo.fn_getUnitConvByName(item1.item_name,'箱',mp.PROD_CODE,dds.PROD_QUANTITY),0) ELSE 0 END)+sum(CASE WHEN dds.PROD_QUANTITY<0 and orgbdi.dict_item_id=1365 THEN isnull(mp.prod_price*dbo.fn_getUnitConvByName(item1.item_name,'箱',mp.PROD_CODE,dds.PROD_QUANTITY),0) ELSE 0 END)
,sum(CASE WHEN dds.PROD_QUANTITY>=0 and orgbdi.dict_item_id=1366 THEN isnull(dbo.fn_getUnitConvByName(item1.item_name,'箱',mp.PROD_CODE,dds.PROD_QUANTITY),0) ELSE 0 END)-abs(sum(CASE WHEN dds.PROD_QUANTITY<0 and orgbdi.dict_item_id=1366 THEN isnull(dbo.fn_getUnitConvByName(item1.item_name,'箱',mp.PROD_CODE,dds.PROD_QUANTITY),0) ELSE 0 END)) AS '销售数量（退货后）' ,sum(CASE WHEN dds.PROD_QUANTITY>=0 and orgbdi.dict_item_id=1366 THEN isnull(dds.PROD_AMOUNT,0) ELSE 0 END)+sum(CASE WHEN dds.PROD_QUANTITY<0 and orgbdi.dict_item_id=1366 THEN isnull(dds.PROD_AMOUNT,0) ELSE 0 END) ,sum(CASE WHEN dds.PROD_QUANTITY>=0 and orgbdi.dict_item_id=1366 THEN isnull(mp.prod_price*dbo.fn_getUnitConvByName(item1.item_name,'箱',mp.PROD_CODE,dds.PROD_QUANTITY),0) ELSE 0 END)+sum(CASE WHEN dds.PROD_QUANTITY<0 and orgbdi.dict_item_id=1366 THEN isnull(mp.prod_price*dbo.fn_getUnitConvByName(item1.item_name,'箱',mp.PROD_CODE,dds.PROD_QUANTITY),0) ELSE 0 END)
,sum(CASE WHEN dds.PROD_QUANTITY>=0 and orgbdi.dict_item_id=1367 THEN isnull(dbo.fn_getUnitConvByName(item1.item_name,'箱',mp.PROD_CODE,dds.PROD_QUANTITY),0) ELSE 0 END)-abs(sum(CASE WHEN dds.PROD_QUANTITY<0 and orgbdi.dict_item_id=1367 THEN isnull(dbo.fn_getUnitConvByName(item1.item_name,'箱',mp.PROD_CODE,dds.PROD_QUANTITY),0) ELSE 0 END)) AS '销售数量（退货后）' ,sum(CASE WHEN dds.PROD_QUANTITY>=0 and orgbdi.dict_item_id=1367 THEN isnull(dds.PROD_AMOUNT,0) ELSE 0 END)+sum(CASE WHEN dds.PROD_QUANTITY<0 and orgbdi.dict_item_id=1367 THEN isnull(dds.PROD_AMOUNT,0) ELSE 0 END) ,sum(CASE WHEN dds.PROD_QUANTITY>=0 and orgbdi.dict_item_id=1367 THEN isnull(mp.prod_price*dbo.fn_getUnitConvByName(item1.item_name,'箱',mp.PROD_CODE,dds.PROD_QUANTITY),0) ELSE 0 END)+sum(CASE WHEN dds.PROD_QUANTITY<0 and orgbdi.dict_item_id=1367 THEN isnull(mp.prod_price*dbo.fn_getUnitConvByName(item1.item_name,'箱',mp.PROD_CODE,dds.PROD_QUANTITY),0) ELSE 0 END)
,(sum(CASE WHEN dds.PROD_QUANTITY>=0 and orgbdi.dict_item_id=1364 THEN isnull(mp.prod_price*dbo.fn_getUnitConvByName(item1.item_name,'箱',mp.PROD_CODE,dds.PROD_QUANTITY),0) ELSE 0 END)+sum(CASE WHEN dds.PROD_QUANTITY<0 and orgbdi.dict_item_id=1364 THEN isnull(mp.prod_price*dbo.fn_getUnitConvByName(item1.item_name,'箱',mp.PROD_CODE,dds.PROD_QUANTITY),0) ELSE 0 END) +sum(CASE WHEN dds.PROD_QUANTITY>=0 and orgbdi.dict_item_id=1365 THEN isnull(mp.prod_price*dbo.fn_getUnitConvByName(item1.item_name,'箱',mp.PROD_CODE,dds.PROD_QUANTITY),0) ELSE 0 END)+sum(CASE WHEN dds.PROD_QUANTITY<0 and orgbdi.dict_item_id=1365 THEN isnull(mp.prod_price*dbo.fn_getUnitConvByName(item1.item_name,'箱',mp.PROD_CODE,dds.PROD_QUANTITY),0) ELSE 0 END) +sum(CASE WHEN dds.PROD_QUANTITY>=0 and orgbdi.dict_item_id=1366 THEN isnull(mp.prod_price*dbo.fn_getUnitConvByName(item1.item_name,'箱',mp.PROD_CODE,dds.PROD_QUANTITY),0) ELSE 0 END)+sum(CASE WHEN dds.PROD_QUANTITY<0 and orgbdi.dict_item_id=1366 THEN isnull(mp.prod_price*dbo.fn_getUnitConvByName(item1.item_name,'箱',mp.PROD_CODE,dds.PROD_QUANTITY),0) ELSE 0 END) +sum(CASE WHEN dds.PROD_QUANTITY>=0 and orgbdi.dict_item_id=1367 THEN isnull(mp.prod_price*dbo.fn_getUnitConvByName(item1.item_name,'箱',mp.PROD_CODE,dds.PROD_QUANTITY),0) ELSE 0 END)+sum(CASE WHEN dds.PROD_QUANTITY<0 and orgbdi.dict_item_id=1367 THEN isnull(mp.prod_price*dbo.fn_getUnitConvByName(item1.item_name,'箱',mp.PROD_CODE,dds.PROD_QUANTITY),0) ELSE 0 END))
FROM DMS_DATA_SALE dds
INNER JOIN DMS_CLIENT dc ON dc.CLIENT_ID=dds.CLIENT_ID INNER JOIN MDM_DISTRIBUTOR mdis ON mdis.DIST_ID=dc.DIST_ID INNER JOIN DMS_PROD_MAPPING dpm ON dpm.DIST_PROD_CODE=dds.PROD_CODE AND dds.CLIENT_ID=dpm.CLIENT_ID AND dpm.DIST_PROD_UNIT=dds.PROD_UNIT left join BASE_DICT_ITEM item1 on dpm.TARGET_UNIT_ID = item1.DICT_ITEM_ID INNER JOIN MDM_PRODUCT mp ON mp.PROD_CODE=dpm.TARGET_PROD_CODE inner JOIN BASE_DICT_ITEM bdi ON bdi.DICT_ITEM_ID=mp.TYPE_ID INNER JOIN DMS_STORE_MAPPING dsm ON dsm.DIST_STORE_CODE=dds.STORE_CODE AND dds.CLIENT_ID=dsm.CLIENT_ID INNER JOIN MDM_STORE ms ON ms.STORE_CODE=dsm.TARGET_STORE_CODE INNER JOIN BASE_ORG bo ON bo.ORG_ID=ms.ORG_ID INNER JOIN BASE_DICT_ITEM orgbdi ON bo.ORG_TYPE_ID=orgbdi.DICT_ITEM_ID WHERE dds.STATE=1 and dds.bill_date between (select cal_date from MDM_CALENDAR where cal_year='$year1$' and cal_month='$month1$' and cal_week='$week1$' and cal_day='1') and (select cal_date from MDM_CALENDAR where cal_year='$year1$' and cal_month='$month2$' and cal_week='$week2$' and cal_day='7') AND orgbdi.DICT_ITEM_ID in(1364,1365,1366,1367) $distId$ $distCode$ $prodCode$ $orgSubCode$ $clientId$ GROUP BY dbo.fn_getMarsWeekDay(convert(VARCHAR(20),dds.bill_date,120)) ,mdis.DIST_NAME ,mp.PROD_CODE ,bdi.ITEM_NAME ,mp.prod_name ,dds.PROD_CODE
